# scylla Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "scylla" {
  token = "supersecrettoken"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `token` (String, Sensitive) Bearer token used to authenticate with the API.

### Optional

- `endpoint` (String) The base URL of the Scylla Cloud API.
